pages.text: $(o)"Her skin is of loam, her eyes are blossoms, and across the barren land she stepped with a goat, and out of the barren land a world was born. The Mother gave birth to all life and herself, and her legacy is found in the water, in the blood, and in the hope."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(item)Fragment of the Mother$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Life$() aspect. It will also breed animals nearby.

In order to find a $(item)Fragment of the Mother$(), the Lock must be opened, but not with a key that is winged, but with the Burning Key. When the Lock is opened, the Moon must watch to acknowledge this, and then, while the Lock is being opened, the Burning Key must be offered a benign sheep of the red.
